overview: Jessie is the new girl at Dana's massage parlor. She meets Marcus, an older man with a kind heart. Marcus ends up being Jessie's friend's father. The two keep running into each other, awkwardly trying to hide their attraction, but attraction always pulls together more than it can keep apart. Sweet Sinner delivers an honest take on lovemaking and passion in this story of forbidden desire. Directed by James Avalon.
title: The Masseuse 3
